content: नु {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} A particle having an interrogative force and implying some ‘doubt’, or ‘uncertainty’; स्वप्नो नु माया नु मतिभ्रमो नु <ls>Ś. 6. 9</ls>; अस्तशैलगहनं नु विवस्वानाविवेश जलधिं नु महीं नु <ls>Ki. 9. 7</ls>; <ls n="Ki.">5. 1</ls>; <ls n="Ki.">8. 53</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">9. 15</ls>, <ls n="Ki. 9.">54</ls>; <ls n="Ki.">13. 4</ls>; <ls>Ku. 1. 46</ls>; <ls>Śi. 10. 14</ls>; <ls>Ś. 2. 9.</ls> {@--2@} It is very often compounded with the interrogative pronoun and its derivatives in the sense of ‘possibly’, ‘indeed’; किं न्वेतत्स्यात्किमन्यदितोऽथवा <ls>Māl. 1. 17</ls>; कथंनु गुणवद्विंदेयं कलत्रं Dk; see किंनु also. {@--3@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Now, even now. {@--4@} Now therefore, now then, therefore. {@--5@} Like, as. {@--6@} Quickly. {@--7@} From this time forward.

नु {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> (नौति, प्रणौति; नुत; {%<ab>caus.</ab>%} नावयति; {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} नुनूषति) {@--1@} To praise, extol, commend; सरस्वती तन्मिथुनं नुनाव <ls>Ku. 7. 90</ls>; <ls>Bk. 14. 112</ls>; see नू. {@--2@} To roar, cry. {@--3@} To sound, shout. II. {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (नवते) To go.
